hero.title: Itinerary
hero.motto: Search interesting places and plan you trip!

about.title: About "Itinerary"
about.description: Do you want to spend less time planning your trip without missing anything? Then this site is for you! You will easily find all the most interesting and popular places, but also you will quickly build and maintain the best route here.

places.title: Places
places.feature-3: Choose and keep your liked points.

route.title: Route
route.description: Build and maintain the best route
route.feature-1: Create a new map or use the points you saved earlier.
route.feature-2: Set the start and end point of the journey-the route is ready.
